data.title: Ego Sapientia, The Wisdom That Is Mary PDF
data.meta_description: Ego Sapientia, The Wisdom That Is Mary.pdf - Free ebook download as PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read book online for free. This dissertation provides a commentary on Charles De Koninck's work "Ego Sapientia" regarding Mary and her place within the Trinitarian order of the universe. The dissertation was submitted by Katherine M. Gardner in partial fulfillment of the requirements for the Doctorate of Theology at Ave Maria University under the direction of Michael Waldstein. It includes acknowledgments, table of contents, index of texts from "Ego Sapientia", introduction, and will conclude with a conclusion and bibliography. The commentary analyzes De Koninck's work through extensive examination and discussion of its chapters and arguments regarding wisdom, God, Mary and creation.
data.text: Ego Sapientia, The Wisdom That Is Mary PDF
